translation.Message_0_Page_0: Second question, if you saw a survivor with an injury that looks infected, would you help them and tend to their wounds or leave them be?
translation.Response_0: I would help them the best I can. We need to rebuild our future society, not lose more to the infection.
translation.Response_1: I would either shoot them or leave them to their business. Who knows if they're already going crazy and wants to hurt me?
